home.hero_title: Partnering with you to bridge the gap from where you are to where you want to be.
home.hero_subtitle: Unlocking potential and achieving goals through professional coaching conversations.

coaching.title: What is Coaching?
coaching.description: ICF defines coaching as partnering with clients in a thought-provoking and creative process that inspires them to maximize their personal and professional potential.
coaching.distinction_1_desc: Focuses on past trauma and healing vs Coaching focuses on future possibilities and action.
coaching.distinction_2_desc: Provides expert answers and diagnosis vs Coaching believes clients have their own answers.
coaching.distinction_3_desc: Senior guiding junior based on experience vs Coaching is a partnership without assumptions.
